name: Stephen Roseberry

text: Whenever I see that bright blue journey my food is always better. Hands down my favorite chef at Pizza Hut.

name: Dan Rhodes
text: The food was just above terrible.  I think their cheese is powder and water base.  The chicken wings aren't a step above getting frozen wings from Walmart and heating in a bag of hot water.   Reheating their cold pizza was throw-away.

text: We ordered online as usual. Drove 23 miles and for the first time ever got the worst cheezy bite pizza. The inner crust was like shoe leather but not as thick. Very little cheese if any in the flat u dercooked bites. Never thought Pizza Hut could make a bad pizza till now.
